text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

"The hottest news spot, the Book Cafe vs.
Retro Game Center, a Local Favorite"

...So, if we make the theme about that feeling...
We might be able to feature both in the article!

Chiyuki-san, you're really mature, huh~...
I admire that. With that approach, we can include both!

Yeah... I'm happy to have both included...!
But, Tenka...

Even if only one of them makes it into the article...
I'd still be happy...

Na-chan... because you chose...
the place Tenka wanted to go...
Tenka-chan... heheh...
...Amana and I are alike, huh.

But... I haven't been able to go...
to the place Chiyuki-san wanted...

Yeah... Amana...
I think maybe you held back...

...Even though there was a place...
you really wanted to go...

...Na-chan... do you...
like Chiyuki-san...?
...I love her...

Kind, mature... I wish Amana
could become such a wonderful woman...

I like Tenka too...
Somehow... Chiyuki-san...

Na-chan and... Tenka-chan... feel...
a lot alike... I like so many things about them...

Heheh... Amana too...!
Tenka-chan and Amana are definitely twins!

Let's do it...! Make Chiyuki-san the focus of the article!
She'll shine in the festival article for sure!

...! Then... let's have her wear that hair accessory...!
It'll definitely match the yukata...!

Great idea, Tenka-chan! Once she wears it,
she'll definitely stand out in the magazine!
